Duellist's Prerogative is one of the Rapier Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Duellist's Prerogative grants a lot of combat actions allowing the wielder to have special reactions during combat. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
